comments.body:
A simple way to make it also work with IPv6 is the following:
```.py
addr = node_info['ManagerStatus']['Addr']
i = addr.rfind(':')
if i >= 0:
    addr = addr[:i]
if addr.startswith('[') and addr.endswith(']'):
    addr = addr[1:-1]
if addr:
    node_info['Status']['Addr'] = addr
```
But there is no information the bug even exists when IPv6 is in use.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +173,177 @@                # This is workaround of bug in Docker when in some cases the Leader IP is 0.0.0.0
                # Check moby/moby#35437 for details
                count_colons = node_info['ManagerStatus']['Addr'].count(":")
                if count_colons == 1:
                    swarm_leader_ip = node_info['ManagerStatus']['Addr'].split(":", 1)[0] or node_info['Status']['Addr']

comments.body:
